title: Senior Android Engineer (FireTV) NEW!
full_description: Contract | $65-85/hr | Seattle,Washington One of the leading entertainment companies in the US is looking to add a Senior Android Engineer to join their content streaming team. This role will be responsible for building out their flagship Android streaming application. The ideal candidate will be someone who is strong in Kotlin and Java and have video/streaming (ideally FireTV) application experience. Required Skills & Experience + 4+ years of professional Android development experience. + Experience working on a streaming or video specific mobile and or TVos application(s) + Experience working on FireTV applications + Kotlin & Java + Strong written and verbal communication skills + BS in CS What You Will Be Doing Tech Breakdown+ 100% Kotlin (Light Java)Daily Responsibilities+ 100% Hands On + 0% Management The Offer + Competitive Pay: Up to $85/hour, DOE + Contract to Hire Duration: 6 month (Contract to Hire)You will receive the following benefits:+ Medical Insurance & Health Savings Account (HSA) + 401(k) + Paid Sick Time Leave + Pre-tax Commuter BenefitApplicants must be currently authorized to work in the United States on a full-time basis now and in the future. Motion Recruitment Partners is an Equal Opportunity Employer.Accommodation will be provided in all parts of the hiring process as required under Motion Recruitment Employment Accommodation policy. Applicants need to make their needs known in advance.
